alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 10:47PM AKST until January 15 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Light snow has begun and will continue into the weekend across the northern panhandle. Snowfall rates will gradually increase in intensity through the weekend as well. Snow has started dry and fluffy but may become wetter and heavier as temperatures warm through the weekend. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO 5 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches. Twelve hour snow rates of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Glacier Bay, Eastern Chichagof Island and City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From 6 AM Saturday to 5 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to start out dry and light and may get wetter and heavier by Sunday. Snow rates will show a gradual increase in intensity through the period with highest snow rates expected Sunday and Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay
